sentences.sContent: Arms control should not be made into a surrogate for peace.
sentences.sCn: 军备控制不应变成和平的替代物。

代理；指定某人为自己的代理人

phrases.pCn: n. 代孕母亲；替身母亲

trans.tranOther: a person or thing that takes the place of someone or something else

trans.tranOther: a surrogate person or thing is one that takes the place of someone or something else
